title: Slot and Plug Description
description: All used slots and plugs shall be described in more detail below.

slots.name: Insert the name of the slot interface, e.g. `package-certificates`
slots.purpose: Via this slot interface the certificate manager can add and access certificates and keys of the snap.

plugs.name: Insert the name of the plug interface, e.g. `network`
plugs.purpose: Describe clearly for what purose you need this plug interface. e.g.: `Used by the App to get network access as a client`..
